first_name: tenant first name (if business, name of accounts payable clerk)
last_name: tenant last name (if business, name of accounts payable clerk)
email_address: tenant mailing address (if business, email of accounts payable clerk)
phone_number: ten digit number for phone calling. Make this just digits, and add formatting capabilities.
business_name: [Optional] the name of the business operating as a tenant

billing_address.street_address1: first line of the street address
billing_address.street_address2: [Optional] second line of the street address
billing_address.zip_code: zip code for the mailing address
